import React from 'react' import "./Testimonial.css" import { testimonialsData } from "../../testimonialsData" import { useState } from 'react' const Testimonial = () => { const [slected , setSlected] = useState(0) return ( <>

Testimonial

what they say about us

{testimonialsData[slected].review}

{testimonialsData[slected].name} { " " } - {testimonialsData[slected].status}

) } export default Testimonial
